data.actual_result: You can "use" them, however, they do not apply.
data.expected_result: You shouldn't be able to right click, or just be able to use them, instead of being able to use it without it applying
data.short_description: Can right click on messages that are pending send, however, none of the options other than Copy ID are working
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a slow internet connection, or send way too many messages, so you've got enough time until they send (like spam "a" over and over, which is what I did in this case) - Right click it before it gets fully white, and sends - Try and use a feature other than Copy ID while it's still pending, the right click menu will close once it's fully sent - Observe that while you can still use them, they still don't apply (for instance, adding an reaction will only add it for less than a second, or editing & attempting to delete via editing won't edit it or delete it)
